lead_paragraph: The victory, along with the recapturing of the Libyan city of Surt, could have a significant effect on the group’s efforts to penetrate Europe and the West.

byline.contributor: Rod Nordland reported from Cairo, and Eric Schmitt from Washington. Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Paris.
byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and ERIC SCHMITT

headline.print_headline: American Drones Record ISIS Fighters Fleeing Northern Syrian City of Manbij
headline.main: U.S. Drones Record ISIS Fighters Fleeing Manbij in Northern Syria

snippet: The victory, along with the recapturing of the Libyan city of Surt, could have a significant effect on the group’s efforts to penetrate Europe and the West....
abstract: American military drones help Syrian rebels liberate city of Manbij and pro-government militia men recapture city of Surt, Libya, from Islamic State militants, dealing two blows to group's efforts to penetrate West.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
